org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project

Class ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project.ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    ProjectHooks

    public static final class ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder
extends Object
    The builder for default Ant project ProjectOpenedHook implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder addClassPathType(String classPathType)
      Adds a class path type among important class path types.
      ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder addClosePostAction(Runnable action)
      Adds an action invoked at the end of ProjectOpenedHook.projectClosed().
      ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder addClosePreAction(Runnable action)
      Adds an action invoked at the beginning of ProjectOpenedHook.projectClosed().
      ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder addOpenPostAction(Runnable action)
      Adds an action invoked at the end of the ProjectOpenedHook.projectOpened().
      ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder addOpenPreAction(Runnable action)
      Adds an action invoked at the beginning of the ProjectOpenedHook.projectOpened().
      ProjectOpenedHook build()
      Creates a new configured ProjectOpenedHook.

      Sets a XSL template to generate build-impl.xml file.
      ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder setBuildScriptProperty(String propertyName)
      Sets the name of property referencing the project build script.
      ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder setBuildTemplate(URL template)
      Sets a XSL template to generate build.xml file.

    • Method Detail

      • addClassPathType

        @NonNull
public ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder addClassPathType(@NonNull
                                                                       String classPathType)
        Adds a class path type among important class path types. The important class path types are registered to GlobalPathRegistry when the project is opened and unregistered when the project is closed.
        Parameters:
        classPathType - the class path type to add.
        Returns:
        the ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder

        @NonNull
public ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder setBuildScriptProperty(@NonNull

        Sets the name of property referencing the project build script. If not set the ProjectProperties.BUILD_SCRIPT is used.
